Title: S4:E7 - How to teach when you’re not an expert (Angela Andrews)
Description: Angela Andrews hosted her first coding workshop at her dining room table. Since then, she's hosted a number of coding workshops, sharing her technical skills and introducing other codenewbies to new tech topics. She shares how she puts on these workshops and how being a newbie herself has helped her be a better teacher. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
